body:
spack currently has two places that list `prefix_inspections`:

1. `etc/spack/defaults/modules.yaml` (and `etc/spack/defaults/darwin/modules.yaml`) contains `modules:prefix_inspections`.
2. `lib/spack/spack/user_environment.py:prefix_inspections()` has nearly the same list, just as python code.

There should be only one place to maintain such a list.
title: List of prefix_inspections duplicated
